 **  circles = cv2.HoughCircles(
       klein     asd, cv2.HOUGH_GRADIENT, 1.5, 50, param1=30, param2=50, minRadius=5, maxRadius=100) **
                        gross            1                                                      0

  [-1 -1 -1  1]]]
